user_query: I won't lie to you guys I was hesitant to make this video as although it's a good part two to my Captain Underpants and Peanuts video I had always skipped over the existence of these books when they came out I was still very attached to Diary of a Wimpy Kid I Funny Big Nate and my only real connection to Dav Pilkey books was grabbing them off of the target shelves and going to the flip-o-rama pages only that was life-changing to little me that didn't know how animation worked and hadn't discovered flip books yet but Diary of a Wimpy Kid is forever Hellbound to never-ending Disney plus specials and Big Nate is I'm still trying to clear my mind of it so I felt it was about time to get familiar with Dog Man after seeing the absolutely gorgeous trailer bringing back that Captain Underpants movie visual style paired with Daft Punk's harder better faster stronger and I finally ordered and read the first three books did I feel embarrassed as a young adult reading them absolutely not I was locked into the simple yet action-packed pages I was on the edge of my seat when Petey was about to crush Dog Man I finished them in 2 hours I wiped tears off my face questioning how Mr. Krupp didn't get Harold and George publishing agents and I put them down fully excited to pretend to be an OG fan when seeing it in theaters and I saw it and I really liked it there's some obvious issues I'm going to get into but it's such a good rendition of the books that you cannot go back and read them without
